channel.title: Cactus Pears on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Cactus Pears on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Cactus Pears’ Review: Grief Spurs a Tender Romance in a Delicate Indian Drama
item.description: After the death of his father, a young man returns to his rural hometown and reconnects with an old friend in Rohan Kanawade’s debut feature, which won the grand jury prize at Sundance.
